description: Deletes a specified file from a specified branch. A commit is created on the branch that contains the revision. The file still exists in the commits earlier to the commit that contains the deletion.

parameters.name: repositoryName
parameters.description: The name of the repository that contains the file to delete.

parameters.name: branchName
parameters.description: The name of the branch where the commit that deletes the file is made.

parameters.name: filePath
parameters.description: The fully qualified path to the file that to be deleted, including the full name and extension of that file. For example, /examples/file.md is a fully qualified path to a file named file.md in a folder named examples.

parameters.name: parentCommitId
parameters.description: The ID of the commit that is the tip of the branch where you want to create the commit that deletes the file. This must be the HEAD commit for the branch. The commit that deletes the file is created from this commit ID.

nested_items.name: commitId
nested_items.description: The full commit ID of the commit that contains the change that deletes the file.

nested_items.name: blobId
nested_items.description: The blob ID removed from the tree as part of deleting the file.

nested_items.name: treeId
nested_items.description: The full SHA-1 pointer of the tree information for the commit that contains the delete file change.

nested_items.name: filePath
nested_items.description: The fully qualified path to the file to be deleted, including the full name and extension of that file.
